WANNABE

Wannabe is an AI-driven career guidance system that aims to reduce indecision, facilitate informed choices, and contribute to a more efficient workforce for High School, Undergraduate, and Graduate Students. It covers 12 career paths, offers personalized advice, and promotes equal opportunities.

Prince Kwembe
